name: Easy Chicken Casserole
author: Amy
summary: Easy chicken casserole that the children will love. Can be made ahead of time and frozen. Great for leftovers.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Boil chicken until cooked through (no longer pink inside), about 20-30 minutes
Chop into bite size pieces and place in a 9x13 inch baking dish
Combine soup, sour cream, onion (optional) and mushrooms (optional)
Pour mixture over chicken and top with crumbled crackers
Cover and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 minutes (or freeze for baking at another time)
